item.title: So far, this is my favorite analogy to use for describing shifting and rev matching on a motorcycle. I thought of it on the spot and this is my first time trying to explain it, so bear with me as I refine it to its simplest form. #revmatch #DownShifting #

item.title: The brakes on your motorcycle are the most important thing to learn. Without quality brakes, you may only get to twist the throttle once. With that being said, I hope you find this video entertaining because I had a lot of fun making it for you. #Motorcyc

item.title: Motorcycles are so much fun. The friction zone that little pull between stopping and going. Sometimes progress just needs a release of tension and a little bit (or a lot a bit) of throttle. ##motorcycle#m#motom#motorcycles
